cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on May 4, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2545, a bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the role of doctors of podiatric medicine in the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 64 (Wednesday, April 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. WENSTRUP:
H.R. 2545.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H1791]
title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the role of doctors of podiatric medicine in the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
